questions.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
What method was used for the synthesis of MOF-1211(Zr/Co)?
What is the crystal system and space group of MOF-1212(Hf/Cu)?
How was the BET surface area of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) determined?
questions.answer: Using N2 isotherm at 77 K after supercritical CO2 activation and degassing under vacuum.

questions.question: What is the role of 2-methylisonicotinic acid in the synthesis of MOF-1212(Zr/Cu)?
questions.answer: It acts as a linker in the formation of the MOF structure.

questions.question: Is the BET surface area of MOF-1211(Zr/Co) higher than that of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
Does MOF-1213(Dy/Cd) exhibit a cubic crystal system?
Was the elemental composition of MOF-1212(Zr/Cu) fully consistent with its expected crystal structure?
questions.answer: No, there was a discrepancy due to the presence of defects and additional species confined in MOF pores.

questions.question: What technique was used to confirm the structure of MOF-1213(Dy/M) analogues?
What was the activation method used for MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) before gas adsorption measurements?
questions.answer: Supercritical CO2 activation followed by degassing under vacuum.

questions.question: Is the space group of MOF-1211(Zr/Co) identical to that of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd)?
What was the primary purpose of using 3-fluoro-4-pyridinecarboxylic acid in the synthesis of MOF-1213(Dy/M)?
questions.answer: It served as a linker to connect metal ions and form the MOF structure.

questions.question: Did the synthesis of MOF-1213(Dy/Fe) yield sufficient material for complete characterization?
What was the observed BET surface area of MOF-1211(Zr/Co) after solvent exchange with acetonitrile?
Was the crystal structure of MOF-1212(Hf/Cu) determined using single crystal X-ray crystallography?
What was the method used to activate MOF-1211(Zr/Co) before gas adsorption measurements?
questions.answer: Solvent exchange with acetonitrile followed by drying under Ar flow and degassing under vacuum.

questions.question: What was the crystal system of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) as determined by single crystal X-ray crystallography?
Is the empirical formula of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd) consistent with its crystal structure?
questions.answer: True, but with a note regarding the presence of solvent accessible voids.

questions.question: What was the role of DMF in the synthesis of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
questions.answer: DMF was used as a solvent and also known to reduce metal ions in the presence of water and heat.

questions.question: Was the BET surface area of MOF-1212(Zr/Cu) determined?
questions.answer: False, the BET surface area of MOF-1212(Zr/Cu) was not established due to lack of permanent porosity.
